news.title: One person dead as light aircraft crashes in Waterford
news.summary: One person died after a light aircraft crashed while trying to make an emergency landing in Waterford.

news.title: McGregor to sue Sky News for defamation over claims he was called a rapist by reporter after Nikita Hand case
news.summary: Conor McGregor has been granted permission to serve legal papers on Sky News for an alleged defamation he claims occurred in the immediate aftermath of his trial last year, after which he was found civilly liable for the rape of Nikita Hand in a Dublin hotel room.

news.title: Joshua Allen faces dangerous driving charge in Cork
news.summary: Joshua Allen (26), the son of celebrity TV chef Rachel Allen, has had a dangerous driving charge adjourned until the New Year.

news.title: Woman (40) charged with threatening Simon Harris posted it would be ‘terrible if something happened’ to his family, court hears
news.summary: A woman has been accused of threatening “violence” to Tánaiste Simon Harris online, posting that it would be “terrible if something happened” to his family.

news.title: Gary ‘Mani’ Mounfield, Stone Roses bassist, dies aged 63
news.summary: Gary ‘Mani’ Mounfield, bassist for The Stone Roses, has died aged 63.

news.title: Enoch Burke’s refusal to answer judge leaves questions about sources of income hanging in the air
news.summary: A third of the way through his blistering judgment ordering the immediate imprisonment of Enoch Burke, Mr Justice Brian Cregan raised an issue that has occupied the minds of judges but has received little attention thus far in the Wilson’s Hospital School saga.

news.title: ‘They’re loaded questions’ – Andy Farrell bites back as he defends Sam Prendergast selection for Ireland v South Africa
news.summary: Andy Farrell has launched a strong defence of his decision to select Sam Prendergast for Saturday’s clash with South Africa, dismissing concerns over the Leinster out-half’s defence.

news.title: McVerry Trust spent €300,000 refurbishing driveway and built peacock enclosure at period property
news.summary: The Peter McVerry Trust spent €300,000 on refurbishing a driveway at a period property it owned in Kildare, and constructed a peacock enclosure and unauthorised lift shaft at the same property, the Public Accounts Committee (PAC) had been told.

news.title: Roy Keane responds as Wayne Rooney accuses Ireland of over-celebrating Hungary win
news.summary: Wayne Rooney said Republic of Ireland team-mates went ‘a little bit over the top’ with their post-match euphoria following their dramatic World Cup qualifying win in Hungary. Roy Keane has accused plenty of footballers of over-celebrating successes.

news.title: ‘There’s nothing but lives being lost'  – mother of teen killed in e-scrambler bike crash calls for vehicles to be banned
news.summary: The mother of a Dublin teenager who was killed after crashing a friend’s e-scrambler motorcycle that he was riding for the first time has called for such vehicles to be banned.
